Phoenix_Icewing
[inlinedial]ww80071[/inlinedial] [inlinedial]ww80s003[/inlinedial] New ones are all 0 cost so far as I can see, but they're not special objects to be placed either, but I also dont see a reason on the card they cant be treated as 0 cost bystanders.... Vs [inlinedial]wol105r[/inlinedial] [inlinedial]wolR200.05[/inlinedial] Old ones are resources, and had costs, so they had to be brought in by the old mechanics So, the old ones had to be paid for and their mechanics point towards costs, but as the word construct is used over and over again, it's likely going to be ignored because as long as the color is right, nothing on the new construct power says otherwise, but since they only work if they're attached to someone, they wouldnt really DO anything because the new power doesnt attach them, whereas the new constructs only work on the map and not when attached (but theres nothing saying they couldnt be attached to the old figures). Though im sure someone will errata them.from being played outright, though I havent seen an actual card for them for the 100% yet
